seed_data_creation: None - used onboarding flow to generate learning path with YouTube resources
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 requested features are fully functional: 1) YouTube links in Learning Path are clickable <a> tags with target='_blank' and Play buttons trigger VideoLearningModal with AI companion, 2) Business Intel Deep Research mode generates comprehensive 8-sheet reports with View Report, Download HTML, and Download CSV buttons, 3) Moltbot tab has full chat interface with welcome message, command system (/help, /status, /clear, /model, /about), and AI responses via /api/agent/chat endpoint.
